page.title: 09Tourism around Newark
page.content: Most people interviewed did not feel that Newark is a tourist attraction,but it could be if improvements were made such as more sign posts directing you to places of interest and a general tidying up. However,they did not want Newark to be modernised in any way.More museums and free car parking were also suggested. A number of tourists who were visiting Newark were asked what they thought of it.Generally,they liked Newark and found it of historic interest particularly the cobbled market place.But they feel that more museums should be built in order to display Newark's history in more detail.
